childrens-writing.title: The Magical Forest
childrens-writing.shortDescription: An enchanting adventure in a mystical forest.
childrens-writing.longDescription: Follow young Ellie as she discovers a hidden world filled with magic and wonder.

childrens-writing.title: The Talking Cat
childrens-writing.shortDescription: A delightful story of a talking cat.
childrens-writing.longDescription: Max the cat helps his young owner solve mysteries in their town.
